scripts.core:deploy: npm run core:minify && cd core && npm publish --access public
scripts.components:deploy: npm run components:minify && cd components && npm publish --access public
scripts.reactive:deploy: npm run reactive:minify && cd reactive && npm publish --access public
scripts.reactive-dom:deploy: npm run reactive-dom:minify && cd reactive-dom && npm publish --access public
scripts.router:deploy: npm run router:minify && cd router && npm publish --access public
scripts.all:minify: npm run core:minify && npm run components:minify && npm run reactive:minify && npm run router:minify && npm run reactive-dom:minify
scripts.all:deploy: npm run core:deploy && npm run components:deploy && npm run reactive:deploy && npm run router:deploy && npm run reactive-dom:deploy
scripts.all:deploy:patch: npm run all:syncVersions patch && npm run all:minify && git add . && git commit && npm run all:deploy
scripts.all:deploy:minor: npm run all:syncVersions minor && npm run all:minify && git add . && git commit && npm run all:deploy
scripts.all:deploy:major: npm run all:syncVersions major && npm run all:minify && git add . && git commit && npm run all:deploy
